Highly motivated and goal-oriented young professional committed to pursuing a long term career in Sales and Business Management. I believe my experience, personal traits, skills and competencies like integrity, adaptability to change, agility, curiosity, quick learner, easy to communicate and hardworking will meet the necessities of the positions in sales and business development.
